text: Æðelstan ealdorman geboce þis land of Uffentune into sancte Marie stowe to Abbendone be þes kinges deige Æðelstanes.

& þæt wes be Winsies biscopes gewittnysse of Bearrucscire & Wulfhem arcebiscop & Rodward biscop & manega oþra ægþer ge biscopas & abbodes & þeinas þe þer gegaderod wæron þer þes tun be þyssan gemæran geled wes into sancta Maria are into Abbendune.

& se arcebiscop Wulfhem & ealla þa biscopes & abbodes þe þer gesomnode wæron amansumeden fram Criste & fram eallum Cristes gemænnes & fram eallam Cristendome þe æfre þas gife undyde oððe þis land gelytlede on læsu oððe on gemæru.
Beo he ascyred & gesceofen into helle grunde aa buten ende.
& cwæþ eall þæt folc þe þer embstod, sy hyt swa, amen, amen.
